error.signature: error: failed to select a version for `crate_name` which could resolve this conflict
error.regex: failed to select a version.*which could resolve this conflict

verdict.summary: Two or more dependencies require incompatible features or versions of the same crate. Resolve by aligning dependency versions.

dead_ends.action: Use [patch] to force a single version without checking compatibility
dead_ends.why_fails: API differences between versions cause compile errors or runtime panics

workarounds.action: Use cargo tree -d to find duplicate dependencies and align versions
workarounds.how:
cargo tree -d  # find duplicates
# Then update Cargo.toml to use compatible version ranges

workarounds.action: Use workspace dependency resolution for monorepo projects
workarounds.how:
# In workspace Cargo.toml:
[workspace.dependencies]
shared-crate = "1.5"
# In member Cargo.toml:
[dependencies]
shared-crate.workspace = true

leads_to.condition: When resolving conflicts reveals missing feature flags

preceded_by.condition: When adding features triggers version conflicts

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Feature-not-found means a feature doesn't exist; feature-conflict means two features or versions are incompatible
